properties.name: Audit Trail
properties.tagline: Get a view on what happens on your site, when it happens

sections.title: Enable Plugin Feature: Audit Trail
summary: Purpose - The Audit Trail is designed so you can look back on events and analyse what happened and what may have gone wrong.
Recommendation - Keep the Audit Trail feature turned on.

sections.title: Audit Trail Options
summary: Purpose - Provides finer control over the audit trail itself.
Recommendation - These settings are dependent on your requirements.

sections.title: Enable Audit Contexts
summery: Purpose - Specify which types of actions on your site are logged.
Recommendation - These settings are dependent on your requirements.

options.name: Enable Audit Trail
options.summary: Enable (or Disable) The Audit Trail Feature
options.description: Checking/Un-Checking this option will completely turn on/off the whole Audit Trail feature

options.name: Auto Clean
options.description: Events older than the number of days specified will be automatically cleaned from the database

options.name: Users And Logins
options.summary: Enable Audit Context - Users And Logins
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: Users And Logins

options.name: Plugins
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: WordPress Plugins

options.name: Themes
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: WordPress Themes

options.name: Posts And Pages
options.summary: Enable Audit Context - Posts And Pages
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: Editing and publishing of posts and pages

options.name: WordPress And Settings
options.summary: Enable Audit Context - WordPress And Settings
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: WordPress upgrades and changes to particular WordPress settings

options.name: Emails
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: Email Sending

options.name: Shield
options.description: When this context is enabled, the audit trail will track activity relating to: Shield
